document.full_text: lia joseph became known worldwide as "monster-in-law" last year, after the media seized on a lawsuit filed by her own son accusing her of trying to stop him from marrying his fiancee.
document.title: new york "monster-in-law" sues her son for defamation
lines_and_colors: lia joseph became known worldwide as "monster-in-law" last year, after the media seized on a lawsuit filed by her own son accusing her of trying to stop him from marrying his fiancee.
